text: Montholon is a commune in the department of Yonne, central France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of Aillant-sur-Tholon (the seat), Champvallon, Villiers-sur-Tholon and Volgré.Arrêté préfectoral 1 April 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Yonne department == References == Category:Communes of Yonne
title: Montholon
